titleStmt.title: An elegie, vpon the much lamented death of that renovvned and ever to be honour'd patriot of his countrey John Pym Esquire lievtenant of the ordnance, and a Member of the honourable House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "It will not be: our sinnes doe yet out-cry".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
